name: Stickman and the Color Coins of Destiny and Destruction
name_original: Stickman and the Color Coins of Destiny and Destruction
description: This game is the beginning of Stickman's adventure! It's very simple, all you need to do is collect all the color coins within the Minotaur's Labyrinth! Don't get caught. The only buttons in the game is spacebar to jump, and the arrow keys to move!
